channel.title: GFX City! [read] [link approved!]
channel.description:
[quote="Bebemycat2"][quote author=mod robby link=action=profile;u=70305 date=1183278135] Hello, I was wondering if I could advirtise my new GFX Community!
Here is the link: http://gfxcity.smfforfree3.com!
thanks, Mod Robby [/quote] Approved. You should talk to Pwnd about getting real gosting and stuff, he will give you a subdomain. :)[/quote]
Approved^^
Well basically its a GFX Posting community!
here are some of my gfxs: [img]http://i113.photobucket.com/albums/n237/robthai/gfxcity.gif[/img] [img]http://i113.photobucket.com/albums/n237/robthai/gotjavasonic.gif[/img] [img]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb310/robby12322/gfxcity-rain.gif[/img] [img]http://i113.photobucket.com/albums/n237/robthai/fingerprint.gif[/img] [img]http://i113.photobucket.com/albums/n237/robthai/teric.gif[/img] [img]http://i113.photobucket.com/albums/n237/robthai/the85s.gif[/img] just a few^^

item.title: GFX City! [read] [link approved!]
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

frost21:

Fastbawlz you should make a graphics forums :)…So this guys graphics forums are already dead?

I would never make a forum. I’m just to lazy…

And yes their site is dead, http://www.codersx.nationvoice.com/gfxcity/index.php
No longer works

[advertisement]Im on Fusion-FX.info anyway…[/advertisement]

Read full topic

item.title: GFX City! [read] [link approved!]
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:18, topic:118532”][quote author=mod robby link=topic=167893.msg1564842#msg1564842 date=1183432107]

[quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=167893.msg1563913#msg1563913 date=1183411644]

[quote]This, like most GFX and Cheating communitys, will probably not get anywhere…

If it does get over 10 members it will be friends/people from forum…

Face it, there are better GFX Communitys then this, with resources more people and a domain…[/quote]

if you dont have anything good to say or havnt at least been on the forums dont post useless stuff like this. Are you 100% sure that it will go no where? the correct answer is no. As for the forums i thinks its a good idea robby you have some good gfx on other sites and i like the way you handle your forums

Yes I am 100% sure… And I did see the website… I signed up to look around… And Javis stfu your only defending him because your a global moderator in his forums…

You have nothing to offer that you cant get in other GFX sites… All your tuts aren’t even yours. So there not even exclusive
To start a site you have to be at least well known in that area. Or actually know something about it. From the looks of your sigs it doesn’t look that you have been in this area for a long time, so you wouldn’t know almost anything about it.

Trust me. Stop the site don’t waste the money like Mr. Chris said…

Maybe in a couple of years if you develop but now you will get no where…
[/quote]Lol…We don’t have any tutorials yet n00b.

listen to fastbawlz and mr.chris! they are experienced with GFX. if you are really sure about this community then just use free hosting so you dont waste money! mr chris tried setting up a GFX community several times but its not enough to match up to BIG sites
[/quote]How did they start??? They had to start somewhere!

Not with a lame community they didn’t with GFX, that arent theirs! If they were yours, you wouldve signed em![/quote]

This is 2 weeks old… No need to bump a site that is already dead…

Read full topic

To start a site you have to be at least well known in that area. Or actually know something about it. From the looks of your sigs it doesn’t look that you have been in this area for a long time, so you wouldn’t know almost anything about it.

Maybe in a couple of years if you develop but now you will get no where…

@welshy wrote:

ok put it this way (from experience) you need to be a very gifted artist and have a some spare change to run a successful GFX forum… look at GR or VR… the owners and members are amazing at GFX which attracts beginners… its not good being a beginner and making a community
